name: Answering AI
description:
Communicate with the selected model. All models are free. You just need an Openrouter API key.
Forked from https://github.com/SeoFernando25/ulauncher-gpt

preferences.name: Openrouter API Key
preferences.description: You need it to get access to selected model

preferences.name: Model
preferences.description: Select the model you want to use. You can find the list of models here: https://openrouter.ai/models

preferences.name: Line Length
preferences.description: The maximum number of characters per line.

preferences.name: System Prompt
preferences.description: A prompt to give some context to the system. This is optional but highly recommended.

preferences.name: Temperature
preferences.description: Lower = Predictable text | Higher = Surprising/Random text (0-1)
